name: 10 The Power of Shazam! Questions | DC Comics Trivia Quiz

questions.text: Who is the alter ego of Captain Marvel?
questions.explanation:
Billy Batson.

	Many comic characters have alliteration in their names. (Matt Murdock, Peter Parker, Scott Summers and Billy Batson for example.)  Ted Kord is Blue Beetle, Vic Sage is The Question and Oliver Queen is Green Arrow.

questions.text: What is the word that Captain Marvel's alter ego says to turn into Captain Marvel?
questions.explanation:
"Shazam!".

	Mary Marvel and Captain Marvel Junior also say "Shazam!" (But Captain Marvel Jr. can't say his own name! He calls himself "CM3"!)

questions.text: Which dastardly rival of Cap's put him in suspended animation for 20 years?
questions.explanation:
Sivana.

	Doctor Sivana trapped the whole Marvel Family in suspended animation for 20 years, as well as himself and his son!

questions.text: While under Roulette's control, whom did Mary Marvel devastate in a one on one battle?
questions.explanation:
Captain Atom.

	Roulette is a villain that forces heroes to fight against each other.  She first appeared in the JSA trade paperback "Fair Play".

questions.text: In the graphic novel, "Kingdom Come", who does Captain Marvel fight?
questions.explanation:
Superman.

	The Big Red Cheese has the upper hand for much of the battle!

questions.text: When Johnny Sorrow and Despero team up to conquer the world in the JSA trade paperback "Virtue and Vice", which one of the seven deadly sins does Captain Marvel exhibit?
questions.explanation:
Gluttony.

	He absorbs the strength of all the Marvel Family!

questions.text: Captain Marvel was once given a lot of magical power and fought one on one with which DC character?
questions.explanation:
Spectre.

	The Spectre is a green-cloaked spirit who punishes the wicked!

questions.text: While investigating trouble in New England, what two heroes did the Justice League meet?
questions.explanation:
Creeper and Doctor Fate.

	Doctor Fate was fighting the Gray Man, and Creeper was also on the scene. Captain Marvel was part of the Justice League at this point.

questions.text: How old is Captain Marvel's alter ego?
questions.explanation:
16.

	Some writers make Cap seem immature due to his actual age, but in later times, he's been acting like an adult.

questions.text: When Cap's alter ego was dating an older member of the Justice Society, who told him off?
questions.explanation:
Jay Garrick.

	Cap left the team, thinking he wasn't ready for a relationship.
